required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety Effects Using Mikelan® LA Ophthalmic Solution (OS) 2% Versus Timoptol® XE Ophthalmic Solution (OS) 0.5% in Ocular Hypertension Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Parallel, Open-label Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety Effects Using Mikelan® LA Ophthalmic Solution (OS) 2% Versus Timoptol® XE Ophthalmic Solution (OS) 0.5% in Ocular Hypertension Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the clinical study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety for Mikelan LA eye drops 2% (once per day) of intra-ocular pressure decreased.

primary_outcome.measure: The change value of Intra-Ocular Pressure (IOP) in study group
primary_outcome.time_frame: assessment will be done every month for 2 months for each subject

secondary_outcome.measure: The change value of IOP between groups
secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessment will be done every month for 2 months for each subject

secondary_outcome.measure: The change percentage of IOP in each group
secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessment will be done every month for 2 months for each subject

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of score of Patient satisfaction in each group
secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessment will be done every month for 2 months for each subject

intervention.description: Experimental: Mikelan, 1 drop/daily, for 8 weeks Active Comparator: Timoptol, 1 drop/daily, for 8 weeks

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Opthalmology/ Tri-Service General Hospital
